title: How Christopher Nolan Develops Story Ideas

comments.text: I love his direction the most except his last 2 movies
comments.author: srinivasnahak3473

comments.text: He just copies and steals ideas and visuals from unknown director. His movie Inception was a pale copy of Satoshi Kon’s “Paprika” movie. Christopher Nolan is a spineless coward who copies the work from people and claims that it’s his. He’s a fake phony RAT 🐀.
comments.author: manteiv

comments.text: I Love this guy what a gigantic talent, and I'm sure for a laugh , he won't mind me mentioning his doppelgänger 'Tim, nice but dim' - a Harry Enfield character lol😁
